summary.name: Ayush Jain
summary.title: I Build What I Envision
summary.subtitle: Product Intuition + Engineering Depth
summary.personalSummary: Most leaders are either product-minded or technically deep. I'm both. 10+ years shipping products at Microsoft, Amazon, Navi, Moonfrog—plus 4 startups I co-founded. Conducted 100+ customer interviews and architected systems at scale: 10M+ events/day, 0.5M concurrent players & 5M DAU, INR 3Cr + USD 1M daily transactions. Ran 50+ A/B experiments driving 10-60% conversion lifts. Polyglot engineer coding since childhood—I collapse the gap between 'what to build' and 'how to build it.' Fluent in AI/LLM enablement—hands-on with MCP, agents, open-source LLMs, grounded in GenAI research & architectural fundamentals.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.team: M365 Copilot & M365 Office · Security Lead & Launch Lead
achievements: [Product] Launched M365 Copilot (Satya Nadella's #1 priority) to 1M MAU. Drove sovereign cloud expansion to 2 new markets in 1.5 months, coordinating cross-functional delivery across engineering, compliance, legal, and design teams.

[Engineering] Delivered 20% faster auth via PFT-PoP/OBO protocol upgrades with optimized token caching. Led 8-dev team to complete 245 security tasks across 15 KPIs. Automated sovereign-cloud provisioning via ARM templates, reducing setup time by 30%. Fixed GDPR issues & enhanced privacy safeguards.

[Leadership] Contributed to doubling dev-count to 80. Mentored 2 peers to promotion. Lowered false alerts by 20%, on-call TAT by 50% via revamped monitoring. Created 11 technical video-docs for knowledge sharing.

[AI & Automation] Championed GenAI adoption—trained team on AI tools, built AI-bots for code-review and issue-delegation, integrated Copilot into dev workflows. Drove 10% dev-productivity gains. Built OS-level Copilot voice-and-vision prototype at Hackathon (FHL).
experience.transition: Seeking Product Manager/Owner role to leverage hands-on AI/LLM expertise and deep technical depth for greater product impact.

experience.title: SDE2 → SDE3 → AEM → Tech Lead
experience.product: Health Insurance (B2C), Group Insurance (B2B), Payments Platform, CRM
experience.technologies: Android, Kotlin, Java, SpringBoot, React, AWS, Firebase, Camunda, Postgres, Redis, Kafka, Kubernetes, Temporal
experience.promotion: 2 promotions in 2 years. Special appreciation from Sachin Bansal (Flipkart co-founder) for launching health insurance app in under 1.5 months.
achievements: [Product 0→1] As first engineer, built health insurance Android app in under 1.5 months. Defined product vision with business & product owners. Conducted 50+ in-person customer interviews and site visits—EMI feature from feedback drove 60% conversion boost. Payment mandates reduced EMI drop-offs by 8%.

[Architecture] Designed & led 20+ dev team to build product-platform: multiplatform rule-engine, DSL for business, product-config-engine, pricing-engine, policy-engine, partners-integrations, underwriting-system, communications-framework, claims-framework. Achieved 95%+ code coverage.

[Payments] Led 6 devs, built 2-layered payments system processing INR 3 Cr/day. Integrated Juspay, Razorpay, PayU with dynamic-switching (+5% conversion). Built ledger-service, EMI, mandates, ICICI bank settlements.

[Experimentation] Built experimentation platform with Firebase/MoEngage. Context-based A/Bs achieved 10-60% conversion lifts. Tested zero waiting-period and simplified policy clauses to boost trust. Reduced clicks-to-purchase by 40% via UX simplification.

[Analytics] Created product dashboards (Metabase/Redash) for funnel analysis, cohort tracking, and revenue insights. No-code product-config via excel enabled 30-60% faster launches. Data-driven renewal upgradability improved renewals by 5%.

[Leadership] Grew team 2→40. Conducted 270+ interviews (won iPhone for Top Interviewer). Mentored 8 engineers (6 promoted). Ran bi-weekly tech sessions on Java, SpringBoot, Kafka, Postgres, debugging, testing. Represented tech in IRDAI regulatory audits.

[EM/Process] Led sprint planning, daily scrums via JIRA. Identified strengths/weaknesses of teammates, set KPIs/KRAs. Ran bi-weekly culture meetups to boost teamwork during remote/COVID. Enforced process: design docs, code reviews, debugging protocols. Built onboarding docs—reduced ramp-up time by 40%.
[Scale & Cost] Enabled 10x scalability with 20% infra cost reduction. Integrated Resilience4j, Sonarqube, GlitchTip. Built message-scheduler supporting 1M messages/interval at 10-sec precision.

[CRM & Automation] Built real-time CRM handling 20k tickets/day with in-app chat, bot-support, agent-assignment. Automated ticket routing and responses via bot—reduced manual load by 60%, cut support costs.
[Outcomes] Launched 8+ retail & group insurance products: 20k+ DAU, 300+ daily purchases, 1+ lac policies/year.
experience.transition: Insurance vertical moved to maintenance mode; leadership dissolved and team downsized. Sought new challenges.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.team: Founding Engineer · Supply Chain Management Platform
experience.technologies: C#, TypeScript, Java, AWS, Camunda, MySQL, MongoDB, Consul, Redis, SQS, Kubernetes
achievements: [Product] Built Ocean-Freight FCL first-leg (Germany) & last-leg (China) with product-owners: rate-management, trucking integrations, customs workflows, port-clearance, hazardous materials handling. Implemented Air-Freight with Lufthansa spot-rates for pallets.

[Engineering] Implemented workflows via Camunda BPMNs. Integrated Resilience4j (circuit-breakers, retries). Improved test-coverage by 20%. Built config-management scripts. Fixed Camunda performance issues.
[Impact] Launched L4 control-tower model in 2 months. Achieved 80+% test-coverage. Represented engineering at Hamburg summit, gave inputs for business-metrics and process-insights.
experience.transition: Product-engineering gaps and absence of live clients; sought opportunity with clearer product-market fit.

experience.title: SE → SSE
experience.team: Real-time Multiplayer Gaming Platform · TeenPatti Gold
experience.product: Poker, Rummy, LAN Multiplayer Engine (B2C Gaming)
experience.technologies: Cocos-2d, C++, NodeJS, TypeScript, AWS, GCP, MongoDB, CouchDB, Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka, Redshift
experience.promotion: Promoted to SSE. When joined: code in shambles, no tests, 15% crash rate, 1M DAU. Left at: 5M DAU, 100M downloads.
achievements: [User Research] Conducted surveys, played games at public events, explored casinos for data-points on game variations. Worked with product & data-science to identify funnel drop-offs.
[Product Launch] Led 8-dev team to launch Poker, Rummy, Tournaments, Dealers-Choice, Andar-Bahar. Achieved 2.5M DAU, D7 retention +30%, conversions +20%. Built experimentation portal for A/B tests.
[LAN Engine] Built LAN gameplay engine (P2P) for Android/iOS in 2 weeks—gained 1M+ users in first month, 0.5M exclusive installs. Reused across 6+ games (Ludo, Bahubali, Card-Captors).

[Reliability] Organized 3 cross-team bug-hunts. Reduced crashes from 15% to 1%. Rewrote communication framework, notification-processing. Migrated RabbitMQ→Kafka reducing game-delta failures by 80%. App reconnects reduced by 30%.
[Retention] Designed and A/B tested 20+ retention experiments—daily rewards, streak bonuses, comeback offers, social challenges. Data-driven iteration improved D7 retention by 30% and D30 by 15%.

[Monetization] Optimized monetization loops—achieved ARPDAU $0.10 ($100K daily rev/1M DAU), ARPPU $15-20 at 2-3% conversion. Mini-games improved engagement 40%+. Integrated PayPal for Middle-East markets (+20% regional inflows).
[Outcomes] Total: DAU 5x to 5M, revenue 2x to USD 3M/month, 100M downloads. Hired 8 developers. Took 70+ interviews.
experience.transition: Co-founders exited the company; explored entrepreneurship with colleagues during mobile gaming boom in India.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
experience.team: Transportation Financial Services · Refunds & Cost Allocation
experience.product: Customer Refunds Platform, Cost Allocation Service (Internal B2B)
experience.technologies: Java, JavaScript, AWS, Oracle-RDB, DynamoDB, SQS, SNS, SWF, Redshift, Lambda, S3, Data-Pipelines
achievements: [Customer Impact] Re-architected IFDR service processing USD 1M+ refunds/day. Migrated from relational DB to DynamoDB with event-driven architecture (SNS/SQS). Reduced operational issues by 97%, improved customer refund experience by 50%.

[Engineering] Built Cost Allocation Service for small-parcel transportation handling 10M+ allocation events/day. Integrated with 6+ teams. Designed generic allocators for manifest, invoice, payments with 95% code coverage.
[Platform] Created reusable data-pipeline framework for Redshift exports—adopted org-wide. Setup metrics dashboards, alarms, SoPs. Peak-preparation and load-testing with 90%+ test coverage.
experience.transition: Sought product ownership and hands-on startup exposure after mastering Amazon's leadership principles and tech practices.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Engineering & Product Lead
entrepreneurialExperience.product: D2C Marketplace, Seller Platform, Order Management (B2C/B2B)
entrepreneurialExperience.technologies: Azure, ReactJS, Java-SpringBoot, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch
achievements: [User Research] Conducted 30+ seller interviews and 50+ in-store visits to understand hyperlocal pain points and customer behaviour. Shadowed kirana store operations to map ordering patterns, peak hours, and delivery expectations.

[Engineering] Built complete e-commerce stack in 6 weeks: payments (Setu, PhonePe), ledger, logistics (Porter), search with ML-based ranking, inventory sync, real-time order tracking. Reduced P95 latency by 60%.
[Growth] Led 7-dev team. Onboarded 3000+ sellers in 2 localities, 150+ daily orders, 20% repeat rate. Iterated on UX based on customer and store feedback loops.
[AI & Productivity] Trained team on AI-assisted development—accelerated coding with Copilot, automated testing workflows.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Pre-seed stage; market conditions and funding landscape posed challenges during 2023 tech downturn.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.team: Founding Member · AI-Enabled Social Network for Professionals
entrepreneurialExperience.technologies: Azure, React, NodeJS, OpenAI GPT-4, WhatsApp Business API, Vector DBs, Python, LangChain
achievements: [AI Product Vision] Defined product for AI-powered professional networking. Built GPT-4 powered AI-persona that learned user preferences, curated introductions, and auto-drafted context-aware messages.

[Data-Driven Pivots] Analyzed user behavior via Mixpanel funnels; pivoted 3x based on analytics—from web-app to WhatsApp-first (3x engagement lift), shifted target from consumers to founders/VCs/HNIs/professionals after analyzing retention cohorts.
[Traction] Acquired 20K users organically, grew to 5K WAU. Crunchbase Heat Score: 80. Onboarded 50+ VCs and founders as early adopters.

[AI-First Development] Built entire product on LLM/GPT-4 backbone using Python, LangChain, OpenAI APIs—semantic matching, embeddings, vector search. Enabled rapid prototyping with AI-assisted coding. Automated WhatsApp workflows via agentic pipelines, cutting dev cycles by 20%.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Pivoted to job opportunities during the 2023 tech market correction and layoff wave.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Founder & Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.team: EdTech Platform for Virtual Learning & Proctored Exams
entrepreneurialExperience.product: Virtual Classroom, Online Exams, Proctoring Solution (B2B EdTech)
entrepreneurialExperience.technologies: React, TypeScript, NodeJS, GCP, MongoDB, BigBlueButton (WebRTC), TensorFlow.js
achievements: [Customer Discovery] Conducted 50+ interviews with parents, teachers, professors, students across 5 societies, 5 schools, 6 IITs and other engineering colleges, and 3 coaching institutes. Iterated product based on live feedback.

[Bold Innovation] Built smartphone-first virtual classroom with interactive whiteboard, screen-sharing, and bandwidth-adaptive streaming for 4G with 1GB/day data limits. AI-powered proctoring: face-detection, eye-tracking, tab-switch detection (95% accuracy). OCR-based auto-evaluation for subjective answers.
[Traction] Onboarded 5+ schools and colleges including IIT Patna and IIM Indore. Launched prepaid online exams—adopted by 3+ coaching institutes.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Microsoft Teams and Cisco Webex offered free subscriptions during COVID; limited resources to compete.

entrepreneurialExperience.title: Co-Founder & Product Architect
entrepreneurialExperience.product: Casual Mobile Games, Regional Language Gaming (B2C)
entrepreneurialExperience.technologies: Unity, C#, NodeJS, Golang, Firebase, Firestore, AWS GameLift
achievements: [Rapid Experimentation] Launched 7 games in 6 months to test engagement and virality hypotheses. Built reusable platform enabling any game launch in 2 weeks—tested referral mechanics, social challenges, daily rewards across genres.

[PMF Discovery] Shabd Khel achieved 51% D1 retention (2x industry avg) with 30K+ downloads. Localized for 7 Indian languages with auto-generated word puzzles and levels. Virality coefficient of 0.4x via WhatsApp share hooks.
[Investor Validation] Positive feedback from Elevation Capital on retention metrics. Acquisition offer from Bombay Play.
entrepreneurialExperience.transition: Ran out of personal savings; positive feedback but no immediate pre-seed investment materialized.

education.note: IIT-JEE 2011: Top 0.4% among 10+ lakh candidates. NJACK Coordinator (2013-14): Led the CS Club.
